Issue.creator: wlahti
Issue.summary: Refactor NewCreateChannelTx to allow attaching ConfigSignatures and signing the envelope
Issue.description: With FAB-17871 in mind, we can refactor NewChannelCreateTx to return a *cb.ConfigUpdate instead of a *cb.Envelope. This will allow us to attach signatures to the inner ConfigUpdateEnvelope as well as use the signing identity to subsequently sign the envelope.
